title: Where are the bodypillows in the merch store?
body:
Tsk tsk Riot games, you really do not understand your fanbase.

Riven, Kat, Ahri body pillows better be added soon!

replies.body: I'd like to pre-order a Nasus and Zed bodypillow
I love waifu pillows. My gf won't let me buy any ):
you guys f{{champion:6}}  the sexiest champion..............

> Tsk tsk Riot games, you really do not understand your fanbase.
> 
> Riven, Kat, Ahri body pillows better be added soon!
